name: The Regular Japanese Show
description:
The Regular Japanese Show is a game about Barry J Johnson, a poor guy who went to Japan searching anime lolis [Gone wrong]

He lost all his money and was forced to stay there. That's when he met an apparently AWESOME game show on the TV while he was on his way to a fish factory interview.

And here start the game, Barry will have to pass several mini-games and collect points from them to obtain his freedom and back to Massachusetts.

Try to get the 3 different finals!

This game was originally created for the game jam "TV Game Jam"

Credits, this game was made by:

  • Eacrow, programmer
  • JesusJorney, artist
  • Flamaroth, composer (Bandcamp)
